Related Frames:


Bindings:


Inferences

Description The cause_of_fire causes fire to the burning_object which will eventually alter the burning_object_condition from its canonical to consumed state.
Type
Description If fire_intensity is high, it will take less fire_duration for the burning_object to be consumed (burning_object_condition).
Type
Description Putting out a fire is carried out with a non-flammable liquid. This inference leads to fruitful linguistic metaphors in Zulu but not so much in English (Kovecses 2005:127).
Type
